response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the butter from the fridge. The robot now has both the prawn and the butter in its inventory. The next step is to close the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take out the butter from the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Turn on the stove
(6) Cook the prawn on the stove
(7) Turn off the stove
(8) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(9) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Close the fridge
    fridge = registry(env,"fridge_dszchb_0")
    close(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
